title: Alessandra Ambrosio shows off her bikini body in peach swimsuit
text:
She co-launched her swimwear line GAL Floripa this year.

And Alessandra Ambrosio showed off her bikini body while modeling a peach two-piece from her brand on Instagram this Friday.

The 38-year-old Brazilian bombshell was also seen rocking sunglasses chains whilst out and about in West Hollywood that day.

Hard at work: Alessandra Ambrosio showed off her bikini body while modeling a peach two-piece from her brand GAL Floripa on Instagram this Friday

Sweeping her hair into a ponytail, the ex-Victoria's Secret Angel wore a burnt-orange T-shirt tucked into her loose-fitted high-waisted jeans.

Alessandra collaborated with her sister Aline Ambrosio and pal Gisele Coria to launch a new swimwear line, which debuted in March.

The brand takes its title from a nickname for Florianopolis, the Brazilian city where Alessandra gave birth to both of her children.

On the go: The 38-year-old Brazilian bombshell was also seen rocking sunglasses chains whilst out and about in West Hollywood that day

Ale, as her fans affectionately call her, is currently in a relationship with Italian hunk Nicolo Oddi, who founded the fashion brand Alanui with his sister Carlotta.

Last year, Alessandra broke her decade-long engagement to RE/DONE founder Jaime Mazur, with whom she shares two children - Anja, 11, and Noah, seven.

Neither Jamie nor Alessandra, who got engaged in 2008, publicly confirmed the breakup reports when they surfaced last March.

Autumnal: Sweeping her hair into a ponytail, the ex-Victoria's Secret Angel wore a burnt-orange T-shirt tucked into her loose-fitted high-waisted jeans

A source had gossiped to Us Weekly that the pair were 'trying to keep their split on the down low, but Alessandra has been out and about ready to mingle and hasn’t been taking Jamie to anything.'

Alessandra, who walked a Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in Miami Beach roughly three months after delivering Anja, left the brand at the end of 2017.

She announced her departure after walking the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in Shanghai - her 17th overall outing at the annual extravaganza.
description: She co-launched her swimwear line Gal Floripa this year. And Alessandra Ambrosio showed off her bikini body while modeling a peach two-piece from her brand on Instagram this Friday.
